mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3060KagoKetteiShukei" ( "hdrToriatsukaiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "hdrRirekiNo" smallint, "hdrShoHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hdrShoHokenshaMei" character varying(40), "sakuseiYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "kaigoKyufuhiKensu" integer, "kaigoKyufuhiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "kaigoKyufuhiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "kogakuServicehiKensu" integer, "kogakuServicehiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "kogakuServicehiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "tokuteiNyushoshaServicehiKensu" integer, "tokuteiNyushoshaServicehiTanisu" numeric(13,0), "tokuteiNyushoshaServicehiFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "hdrTorikomiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "hokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hokenshaMei" character varying(40) )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3061KagoKetteiMeisai" ( "toriatsukaiYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "rirekiNo" smallint, "renban" smallint, "jigyoshoNo" rgdb."DbUDD004JigyoshaNo", "jigyoshoMei" character varying(40), "kohiFutanshaNo" character varying(40), "kohiJukyushaNo" character varying(40), "kohiShokisaiHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "serviceTeikyoYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "serviceShuruiCode" rgdb."DbUDD005ServiceShuruiCode", "serviceShuruiName" character varying(40), "kagomoushitateJiyuCode" rshare."UDD035Code", "kagomoushitateJiyu" character varying(40), "tanisu" numeric(13,0), "hokenshaFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "torikomiYm" rshare."UDD014YM" )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT0001Hihokensha" ( "meisaiRenban" smallint, "shoHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "orgHihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "serviceTeikyoYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "orgHihokenshaKanaShimei" character varying(40), "orgHihokenshaShimei" character varying(40), "oldShichosonCode" rshare."UDD023LasdecCode", "henkanHihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "hihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "shichosonCode" rshare."UDD023LasdecCode", "KannaiKangaiKubun" character varying(40), "yubinNo" character varying(40), "choikiCode" character varying(40), "gyoseikuCode" character varying(40), "gyoseikuMei" character varying(40), "jusho" character varying(40), "banchi" character varying(40), "katagaki" character varying(40), "kanaMeisho" character varying(40), "meisho" character varying(40), "shimei50onKana" character varying(40), "shikakuShutokuYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" character varying(2), "shikakuSoshitsuYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" character varying(2), "setaiShuyakuNo" character varying(40), "shikibetsuCode" rshare."UDD001ShikibetsuCode", CONSTRAINT "DbWT0001_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("meisaiRenban") )

CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiError" ( "errorKubun" character varying(40), "shoHokanehshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "hihokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD002HihokenshaNo", "key1" character varying(40), "key2" character varying(40), "key3" character varying(40), "key4" character varying(40), "key5" character varying(40), "hihokenshaKanaShimei" character varying(40), "hihokenshaShimei" character varying(40), "biko" character varying(40) )

insert.id: 過誤決定集計一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT3060KagoKetteiShukei" VALUES ( #{取扱年月}, #{履歴番号}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{証記載保険者名}, #{作成年月日}, #{介護給付費件数}, #{介護給付費単位数}, #{介護給付費保険者負担額}, #{高額介護サービス費件数}, #{高額介護サービス費単位数}, #{高額介護サービス費保険者負担額}, #{特定入所者介護サービス費等件数}, #{特定入所者介護サービス費等費用額}, #{特定入所者介護サービス費等保険者負担額}, #{取込年月}, #{保険者番号}, #{保険者名})

insert.id: 過誤決定明細一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT3061KagoKetteiMeisai" VALUES ( #{取扱年月}, #{履歴番号}, #{連番}, #{事業所番号}, #{事業所名}, #{公費負担者番号}, #{公費受給者番号}, #{公費証記載保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月}, #{サービス種類コード}, #{サービス種類名}, #{過誤申立事由コード}, #{過誤申立事由}, #{単位数}, #{保険者負担額}, #{取込年月})

INSERT INTO "DbWT0001Hihokensha" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月末日}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{旧市町村コード}, #{変換被保険者番号}, #{登録被保険者番号}, #{市町村コード}, #{管内管外区分}, #{郵便番号}, #{町域コード}, #{行政区コード}, #{行政区名}, #{住所}, #{番地}, #{方書}, #{宛名カナ名称}, #{宛名名称}, #{氏名50音カナ}, #{資格取得日}, #{資格取得事由コード}, #{資格喪失日}, #{資格喪失事由コード}, #{世帯集約番号}, #{識別コード} )

insert.id: 処理結果リスト一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiError" VALUES ( #{エラー区分}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{キー1}, #{キー2}, #{キー3}, #{キー4}, #{キー5}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{備考} )
